oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Serum transferrin in calves infected with Haemophilus somnus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McNair, J.
Elliot, C.
Bryson, D. G.
Mackie, D. P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: immunoassay
transferrin
Haemophilus suis
pneumonia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A competitive immunoassay, based on time-resolved fluorimetry, was developed and used to measure the serum concentration of transferrin in 10 calves with acute pneumonia induced by an experimental infection with Haemophilus suis. Full article published in Veterinary Journal (1998) 155, 251.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 96
